work.name: Penta Global Limited
work.summary: Currently engaged in research on time series forecasting, small object detection, and medical visual question answering (VQA), with a focus on linear projection, prompt learning, and fine-tuning strategies for large language and vision-language models (LLMs & VLMs)
highlights: Developed AI models for various applications

work.name: Eximus Technologies
work.summary: Built and optimized web applications using Laravel, Vue.js, React.js, and MySQL. Developed APIs, integrated payment and payroll modules, and ensured responsive design.
